zh: 中信ESG投資級債以追蹤ICE 15年期以上已開發市場ESG美元投資級公司債券指數為目標。該指數參考ESG研究機構Sustainalytics所提供ESG風險分數，指數成分只保留ESG風險分數在中度(含)以下的債券，藉此降低指數成分的ESG風險。
永豐台灣ESG永續優質ETF基金採用指數化策略複製追蹤標的指數績效表現，基金標的指數為FTSE Taiwan Target Exposure ESG Index，其採用富時的目標因子曝險法(Target Exposure)挑選ESG評等及股利率因子較高之公司編制，並以整體ESG評分優於FTSE Taiwan Index做為永續投資目標。
凱基ESG BBB債15+以追蹤彭博MSCI 15年以上美元BBB級ESG永續公司債券指數為目標，標的指數投資流通在外餘額大於10億美元的大型債券，排除償債順位較差的次順位債，單一產業比重不超過15%，避免落入產業過度集中，布局善盡社會責任的公司所發行的債券。
中信上櫃ESG 30以追蹤臺灣指數公司特選上櫃ESG 30指數為目標。該指數參考「台灣永續評鑑S.E.E.D.」模型，篩選符合財務指標及ESG指標的企業，以表彰兼具可投資性及永續發展表現性之上櫃公司投資績效表現。
特選上櫃ESG電子菁英報酬指數特色為表彰上櫃市場具永續發展之代表性電子類股的含息投資績效表現，其指數編製方式為使用永續報告書、年報、政府資訊及財務數據等公開資料，設計評鑑模型，產製「企業ESG表現分數」，結合財務指標、市值，選取10檔上櫃電子類股，運用自由流通市值加權，來編製臺灣指數公司特選上櫃ESG電子菁英報酬指數。
「元大上櫃ESG成長N」代號為 “020027”，由元大證券發行，連結「特選上櫃ESG成長報酬指數」。該指數是由臺灣指數公司、櫃買中心與永續協會合作，每年從ESG表現良好的企業中，以四大成長指標挑選10檔上櫃股票作為成分股。透過「元大上櫃ESG成長N」實現投資永續發展、高成長的兩大目標，投資人可以獲得無追蹤誤差的報酬指數收益。
元大證券發行的指數投資證券”元大上櫃ESG高息N”，代號為”020035”， 100%連結”特選上櫃ESG永續高股息報酬指數”。該指數是由臺灣指數公司、櫃買中心與永續協會合作，挑選ESG分數、現金股利殖利率及市值都表現優異的成分股。元大上櫃ESG高息N是台灣第一檔配息的ETN，發行期間為五年，每年配息一次。
10084台北市羅斯福路二段100號15樓 電話:(02)2369-9555 Email:server@tpex.org.tw

en: CTBC 15+ Year Developed Markets US Corporate Best-in-Class ESG Bond ETF tracks the performance of ICE 15+ Year Ultra Large Cap Developed Markets US Corporate Best-in-Class ESG Index. ESG data is sourced from Sustainalytics. To reduce the ESG risk, the index will only include constituents with ESG risk Score lower than Medium risk.

The FTSE Taiwan Target Exposure ESG Index is designed to deliver defined levels of fixed percentage improvement on ESG ratings and trailing dividend yields. The index also provides balanced exposure to five recognized factors that contribute to equity market performance – Quality, Value, Momentum, Low Volatility and Size.

KGI 15+ Year US BBB ESG Sustainable Corporate Bond ETF closely track the performance of Bloomberg Barclays MSCI US Corporate BBB Senior SRI Sustainable BB+ 15+ ex China 15% Sector Capped Index (before fees and expenses), and deploys bonds issued by companies that fulfill their social responsibilities.

CTBC TIP Customized TPEx ESG 30 ETF tracks the performance of TIP Customized TPEx ESG 30 Index. TPEx-listed stocks with the exclusion of high energy consuming and polluting industries that meet the liquidity and financial criteria are further ESG-screened based on the “Taiwan Sustainability Ratings”. TIP TPEx ESG 30 Index represents the investment performance of stocks that are both investable and well ESG-performed.

The TIP Customized TPEx ESG IT Elite Total Return Index features the dividend reinvested performance of the TPEx-listed electronic companies that are sustainable and representative in TPEx Mainboard. The index is built up by using corporate sustainability reports, annual reports, government information, financial data, and other public information. The constituents of TIP Customized TPEx ESG IT Elite Total Return Index are weighted according to their free float adjusted market capitalization. TIP Customized TPEx ESG IT Elite Total Return Index is compiled by selecting 10 TPEx-listed electronic companies which fulfill criteria of financial indicators and market capitalization.

“Yuanta TPEx ESG Growth ETN（020027）” is issued by Yuanta Securities, linked with “TIP Customized TPEx ESG Growth Total Return Index”. Taiwan Index Plus Corp. annually utilizes ESG scores and four categories of growth index to select 10 individual stocks listed in TPEx as the component of the index. Invest sustainable development and growth through “Yuanta TPEx ESG Growth (020027)”. ETN is 100% linked with total return index, without any tracking error.

“Yuanta TPEx ESG HD ETN（020035）” is issued by Yuanta Securities, 100% linked with “TIP Customized TPEx ESG High Dividend Total Return Index”. Taiwan Index Plus Corp. utilizes ESG scores, dividend yields and market cap to select individual stocks listed in TPEx as the component of the index.“Yuanta TPEx ESG HD ETN（020035）” is the very first ETN which directly distributes dividend to investors. Dividend will be paid annually until maturity date 2027/10/04.
